text: :bulb: For the Color field in the DM, it would be nice if we were able to have the opacity as a decimal and not a whole number, makes it easier to work with opacity in CSS. Granted its as simple as throwing ` / 100 ` at the end of the module var but I am trying to find a use case where you wouldn't want the percentage in decimal form.
Idea: in a few months replace the preview screenshot for HubSpot pages with HTML portals. For science! <https://media.giphy.com/media/HyvnMHUEOSY8M/giphy.gif>
